findings.title: Use of “tx.origin” as part of authorization control (SWC-115)
findings.description: Use of tx.origin should not be used for authorization. Use msg.sender instead.

findings.title: Potential use of “block.number” as source of randomness (SWC-120)
findings.description: Using block.number as a source of randomness is insecure and can be exploited.

findings.title: Owner can set buy/sell fees up to 25%
findings.description: The owner has the capability to set buy and sell fees up to a maximum of 25%.

findings.title: Owner can set max transaction limit not lower than 0.1% of total supply
findings.description: The owner has the ability to set a maximum transaction limit that is not less than 0.1% of the total supply, which may lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can set max wallet amount not lower than 1% of total supply
findings.description: The owner has the capability to set the maximum wallet amount to a value not less than 1% of the total supply.
